title: Online PBL-Based Social Domain Learner Engagement Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in social studies and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A blended PBL (Project-Based Learning) course for job seekers to enhance practical competencies in social fields. Mandatory use of digital devices (laptops/tablets).

learning_goals: Learners complete 80% or more of PBL team project assignments using online collaboration tools
Learners participate in discussions at least three times per week while analyzing real-world social science cases
Learners improve learning outcomes three or more times through peer feedback and self-assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
